## Introduction

This report details data collected from 1 Jan 2023 to "`r Sys.Date()`" by the Colorado State University (CSU) Agriculture Water Quality Program (AWQP). For more information, please contact AJ Brown at [Ansley.Brown\@colostate.edu](mailto:Ansley.Brown@colostate.edu){.email} or visit the CSU AWQP Website at <https://waterquality.colostate.edu>.
